title.en: DevOps: Automating Software Delivery and Operations
title.et: DevOps: tarkvara tarnimise ja käituse automatiseerimine

description.en: This course mainly focuses on upgrading the conventional software development skills of our students with hands-on experiences on DevOps practices and culture. This course covers DevOps automation practices and tool categories including GitHub/GitLab, Jenkin, Ansible, OpenStack, Docker, OpenAPI, Prometheus, and many more.
description.et: Kursus keskendub levinud tarkvaraarenduse oskuste täiendamisele praktiliste kogemustega DevOps valdkonna tavadest ja kultuurist. Kursus katab DevOps automatiseerimise tavasid kasutades tööriistu nagu GitHub/GitLab, Jenkins, Ansible, OpenStack, Docker, OpenAPI, Prometheus jt.

objectives.en: The primary objective of this course is to provide the basic understanding of core principles, practices and tools of DevOps. Students will be able to learn how the software delivery process is fastened by adopting DevOps approach.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärk on anda teadmisi DevOpsi põhimõtetest, tavadest ja tööriistadest. Üliõpilased õpivad kuidas  DevOpsi lähenemisviis kiirendab tarkvara tarnimise protsessi.

learning_outcomes.en: By completing this course students will be equipped with:
- In-depth understanding and necessity of DevOps.
learning_outcomes.et: - Omab põhjalikku arusaama DevOps-ist ja selle vajalikkusest

learning_outcomes.en: - Skills to bring automation in different software delivery phases.
learning_outcomes.et: - Oskab automatiseerida tarkvara tarne erinevaid etappe

learning_outcomes.en: - Software stack that is needed to implement CI/CD.
- Skills to automate the testing, building, and integrating the software packages/modules.
learning_outcomes.et: - Oskab automatiseerida tarkvarapakettide/moodulite testimist, kompileerimist, integereerimist.

learning_outcomes.en: - Knowledge on monitoring and scaling of the deployed software.
learning_outcomes.et: - Omab teadmisi publitseeritud tarkvara monitoorimise ja skaleerimise kohta.

independent_work.et: Instructions for performing independent work will be given during lecture and will be available online at the course website (https://courses.cs.ut.ee/).

description.et: The final examination will assess the level of knowledge from both theoretical and practical aspects. Assessment of theoretical knowledge will have high contribution compared to practical knowledge. The details will be posted on the course website.

Homework in practice session will be listed in the course web page (https://courses.cs.ut.ee/). Students need to submit the weekly homework on the same week.  
Active participation and timely submission of the homework is highly recommended to secure higher grade.

grade_preconditions.et: Submission of at least 80% of all homework is a must-have condition to be able to attend  final examination and final assessment.

grade_evaluation.et:
Timely submission of homework and practical : 50 points
Final examination: 45 points
Active participation in lecture : 5 points


The final score (sum of above out of 100) will be mapped to a grade between A and F using the standard University scale. 
Students can choose any one of the final exam dates.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.et:

You may find detailed scheduled in the course webpage (https://courses.cs.ut.ee/)

audience.et: Master's and 3rd year Bachelor students. Students should have a good knowledge on Python programming language and familiar with Linux environment.
